definitions.definition: A row of balusters topped by a rail , serving as an open parapet , as along the edge of a balcony , terrace , bridge , staircase , or the eaves of a building.

main_definition: A row of balusters topped by a rail , serving as an open parapet , as along the edge of a balcony , terrace , bridge , staircase , or the eaves of a building.
